about_the_game:
A gripping detective series filled with mystery and riddles awaits you! You, by some unfortunate chance, have managed to get on a train full of petty criminals and scoundrels. And now you're sitting there wondering who you can trust and who you can't? Solve each passenger like a piece of a puzzle. Are you ready to embark on an unforgettable journey where you will have to play the best puzzles and brainteasers of all time, search and find objects, and get incredible fun and positive emotions! Challenge your investigator skills in this spectacular new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

This Collector's Edition includes:

🔎 A grand story
🔎 Unique content
🔎 Own solutions
🔎 Diverse achievements
🔎 Intuitive gameplay
🔎 Collectibles
🔎 Over 100 riddles and puzzles
🔎 Anytime, anywhere
🔎 For old and young

  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: The lives of three ordinary men become closely intertwined with the life of one woman. One by friendship, one by love, and one by murder. Will you be able to unravel this tangle and find the murderer?
